amendment.description: To improve the Cost of War Toxic Exposures Fund.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5186, under the order of 8/2/22, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 48. Record Vote Number: 278.

action.text: Amendment SA 5186 proposed by Senator Toomey. (consideration: CR S3848; text: CR S3848) To improve the Cost of War Toxic Exposures Fund.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 5186, under the order of 8/2/22, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 48. Record Vote Number: 278.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 5186, under the order of 8/2/22, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 48. Record Vote Number: 278.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5186 proposed by Senator Toomey.
